DOC.detailed_description: To determine whether oral paracetamol ibuprofen well efficacy tolerance closure patent ductus arteriosus preterm infant . Eighty preterm infant patent ductus arteriosus enrol prospective-randomized study . Patients receive oral ibuprofen initial dose 10 mg/kg , follow 5 mg/kg 24 48 h oral paracetamol 15 mg/kg per dose every 6 hour . One follow echocardiographic criterion duct size > 1.5 mm , leave atrium-to-aorta ratio > 1.5 , left-to-right shunting blood , end diastolic reversal blood flow aorta , poor cardiac function addition sign patent ductus arteriosis determine need treatment .
